item.title: Prawaas 4.0: Tata Motors demonstrates safe, smart and sustainable mass mobility solutions
item.description: Tata Motors showcased its latest mass mobility solutions at Prawaas 4.0, including the new Tata Ultra EV 7M electric bus. Featuring zero emissions, advanced safety features, and fast charging, the bus is designed for urban environments. Tata Motors continues to lead in sustainable transport with various electric, CNG, and alternative fuel vehicles.

item.title: Veera Vahana and Exponent Energy unveil world's first 15-minute charging intercity electric bus - Veera Mahasamrat EV
item.description: Veera Vahana has collaborated with Exponent Energy to introduce the world's first 15-minute charging intercity bus, the Veera Mahasamrat EV. Equipped with a 320 kWh battery, it offers a sustainable alternative to diesel buses on long routes. The initiative begins on the Bengaluru-Hyderabad route with four 1 MW charging stations.
